meta.title: Recipes
meta.description: Really explosive combinations! Discover easy-to-prepare recipes with your favorite Taqueritos and the collaboration of our chef Marco Prats.

page.title: Recipes
page.description: Really explosive combinations! Discover easy-to-prepare recipes with your favorite Taqueritos and the collaboration of our chef Marco Prats.
page.no_recipes: No recipes available at this time.

items.title: Jalapeño Poppers with Taqueritos Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: Mix the cream cheese, garlic, onion, paprika, salt and Worcestershire sauce in a container.
Step 2: Fill the jalapenos with the mixture.
Step 3: Beat the egg over a second layer and pass the jalapeño over the flour and egg.
Step 4: In a recent grind the Taqueritos Chile Toreado.
Step 5: Pass each jalapeño over the crushed Taqueritos. In a frying pan, heat enough oil and fry the jalapenos until golden.
Step 6: Serve and enjoy with your favorite sauce.

items.title: TaqueDogs
instructions: Step: Arm your TaqueDogs and enjoy

items.title: Creazy Corn with Taqueritos Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: Let’s break each of the corn and then place them in a pot with hot water.
Step 2: When they are ready, remove them and remove the excess water. It passes them through the mayonnaise completely covering it.
Step 3: The Taqueritos place them in a food processor and crush them. Once crushed, cover the corn and serve them little lemon.

items.title: Toreado Cheese Dice with Taqueritos Chile Toreado
ingredients: 1 pound of diced cream cheese or quesillo
2 cups of crushed Taqueritos Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: Blend the taqueritos in a food processor.
Step 2: Pass the cheese cubes through the flour, the egg and the crushed Taqueritos.
Step 3: Heat the oil to fry each of the cubes or dices of cheese.
Step 4: Remove them and remove the excess oil and enjoy.

items.title: Caesar Salad with Toreado Chicken and Taqueritos Queso Fusión
ingredients: 1 cup of shredded Taqueritos Queso Fusión
1 cup of whole Taqueritos Queso Fusión
Oil for frying the necessary quantity
instructions: Step 1: Season the chicken breasts and then put a little oil in a pan and cook. Once it’s ready cut into chunks.
Step 2: On a plate, place the chopped lettuce so that you can later place the chicken on top and sprinkle with the Parmesan cheese.
Step 3: Drop the Taqueritos on top of the salad as if they were croutons.
Step 4: Garnish with Caesar sauce.

items.title: Mango Prepared with Taqueritos Queso Fusión y Chile Toreado
ingredients: 1 bag of Taqueritos Queso Fusión y Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl place all the ingredients and mix perfectly.
Step 2: Put in the refrigerator for about 20 minutes and enjoy.

items.title: Ham and Cheese Quesadilla with Taqueritos Chile Queso Fusión
instructions: Step 1: In each of the tortillas we are going to place one of the tablespoons of butter. Then we will place 4 of the cheese slices.
Step 2: Then we will put 4 slices of ham on top.
Step 3: Now we place the Taqueritos around the entire tortilla and on top of the last 4 slices of cheese.
Step 4: To finish we will use the flour tortilla on top and then we take it to a pan and brown it on both sides.
Step 5: Cut in half and serve as desired with ranch sauce.

items.title: Roasted Meat with Taqueritos
ingredients: 1 bag of 36 g Taqueritos Chile Toreado
1 bag of 36 g Taqueritos Queso Fusión
instructions: Step 1: Season the meat with the salt and pepper. Then cook in a pan and when ready to reserve.
Step 2: Serve the Taqueritos on a plate or container.
Step 3: Serve the meat on top and the chismol.
Step 4: Add the jalapeño if you like.

items.title: Breaded Chicken Wings Taqueritos Toreado and Fusion Cheese
ingredients: Seasoned with salt and pepper to taste
instructions: Step 1: Mix the spices (salt, pepper, garlic, and cumin, then season the chicken wings).
Step 2: Let the seasoned wings rest for about half an hour.
Step 3: Blend the two types of in a food processor and mix in a bowl.
Step 4: Dip the wings into the flour, then the egg, and finally the Taqueritos.
Step 5: Heat the oil and fry the wings.
Step 6: Serve the wings on a plate and accompany them with the sauces.

items.title: Ice Cream Taco Taqueritos Chile Toreado
ingredients: 1 tablespoon of jelly of your taste
1 tablespoon of caramel or chocolate syrup
1 bag of 36g Taqueritos Chile Toreado or Queso Fusión
instructions: Step 1: Place the ice cream scoops.
Step 2: Add the jelly and syrup.
Step 3: Place one of the two types of Taqueritos around the ice cream and decorate with some cherries.

items.title: Omelette with Taqueritos Chile Toreado
ingredients: 1 tablespoon onion, minced Grated mozzarella cheese
¼ cup of Taqueritos Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: Beat the eggs and add salt and pepper to taste.
Step 2: Heat a tablespoon of oil in a non-stick pan and fry the onion over medium heat until transparent and add it to the egg.
Step 3: In the same skillet add the other tablespoon of oil and raise the temperature to medium high heat. Add the egg and cook until set.
Step 4: Flip it over with the help of a spatula or lid. Add the cheese and the taqueritos and close the omelette.
Step 5: Reduce the heat to medium low and cook until the cheese is melted.

items.title: Baked Pasta with Taqueritos Queso Fusión
ingredients: 1 can of tuna in water drained
1 package of Coditos previously cooked al dente (according to package instructions)
½ cup of shredded Fusion Cheese Taqueritos
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350ºF.

Step 2: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat and brown the onion for 3 minutes. Add the mushrooms and cook for 3 more minutes. Add the tuna, cream cheese, milk and mix well. Season with salt and pepper to taste and remove from heat.

Step 3: Add the olives, mix them and little by little add the pasta. Stir it well and place it in a previously greased baking dish. Add the Parmesan cheese, the taqueritos and the chives on top. Cover the pan with aluminum foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for 5 more minutes.

items.title: Spicy Shrimp with Taqueritos
ingredients: 2 cups of crushed Chile Toreado Taqueritos.
instructions: Step 1: With a mortar crush the Taqueritos, until they are well ground, place them in a bowl.
Step 2: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the milk, add the flour, salt, and pepper
Step 3: until smooth. Preheat the oil to 180 ° C. Pass the clean and dry shrimp through the mixture of milk, egg and flour.
Step 4: Put the shrimp on the hot oil and cook for 2 minutes until they are golden brown and crisp.
Step 5: Serve hot with tartar sauce.Tartar sauce:Procedure:
Step 6: Tartar sauce: Procedure:
Finely chop the gherkins
capers and parsley
Put the mayonnaise and lemon juice in a bowl and mix the capers and the chopped pickle and parsley
chop the onion and garlic clove and add to the mixture
Add the salt and pepper and 1 tablespoon of pickle juice mix well and ready to accompany your roasted shrimp

items.title: Crunchy Bends with Taqueritos Queso Fusión
ingredients: 1 cup of Fusion Cheese Taqueritos, halved
Pico de gallo, cream and chopped lettuce to serve
instructions: Step 1: Season the meat with the salt.
Step 2: Heat the oil in a skillet and brown the meat over medium high heat for 3 minutes..
Step 3: Add the taco seasoning and sauce and heat for 3 more minutes. Remove from heat and reserve.

Step 4: On a flour tortilla, place a layer of meat, then follow with a layer of cheese and finish with a Taqueritos Queso Fusión. Close the tortilla in parts, bringing the edge to the center and overlapping each fold.
Step 6: Heat a griddle or a frying pan and brown the folded on both sides over medium heat.
Step 7: Serve with chopped lettuce, cream and pico de gallo on top.

items.title: Small balls covered of Zibas with Taqueritos
ingredients: 1 Chips Creams and Spices crushed from Zibas bag
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, mix the cream cheese with the cheddar cheese, garlic salt, bacon, chives and paprika.
Step 2: Shape this mixture into balls and cover with the crushed Zibas.
Step 3: Place the balls on a tray and let them cool for 1 hour.
Step 4: Before serving, place a Taquerito in the middle of each ball and serve.

items.title: Rajitas with Taqueritos Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: Cut the fruits and vegetables into strips.
Step 2: Crush the Taqueritos until they become a powder and cover the fruits and vegetables with this powder.
Step 3: Add lemon to taste and serve.

items.title: Fried Cheese with Taqueritos
ingredients: 1 Taqueritos Chile Toreado (or the flavor of your preference)
instructions: Step 1: Blend the Taqueritos.
Step 2: Cut the cheese into flakes.
Step 3: Place the egg in separate containers and the flour in another.
Step 4: Dip the cheese flakes in the flour, then in the egg, and finally in the crushed Taqueritos.
Step 5: Heat the oil in a pot and dip the cheese until golden brown.
Step 6: Serve and garnish with dressing and jalapeño peppers.
